snippet: CBS Radio said Monday that WFAN would start broadcasting at 101.9 FM in November, and it did not dismiss the possibility that the sports talk station could disappear from AM.
abstract: CBS Radio said Monday that WFAN would start broadcasting at 101.9 FM in November, and it did not dismiss the possibility that the sports talk station could disappear from AM.

headline.main: WFAN Finds Another Home, on the FM Dial
headline.print_headline: Sports-Talk WFAN-AM Is Set to Air On FM Dial
